title: Persistent Systems
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: persistent_systems
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $218.0K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Persistent Systems. The average
  contract duration was 0.5 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $469.4K. The longest
  contract was 3.76 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.8M.
lookup_name: 'PERSISTENT SYSTEMS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '218.0K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '22'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '5%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '60%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '600.0K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.5'
s421_mean_contract_value: '469.4K'
s425_max_duration: '3.76'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.8M'
---
